1370: Kerolus moved to Waale straet.A.6 after marriage.
Got married to Remsindis at age 33 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Remsindis, Marisseis, at age 33.
1371: Had a daughter with Remsindis, Marie, at age 34.
1374: Had a son with Remsindis, Coclike, at age 37.
1376: Had a son with Remsindis, Ino, at age 39.
1377: Had a son with Remsindis, Woutgerus, at age 40.
1378: Lost daughter Marie when Marie was 8 years old.
1379: Had a son with Remsindis, Gheynekine, at age 42.
Lost son Ino when Ino was 4 years old.
Lost son Gheynekine when Gheynekine was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1380: Had a daughter with Remsindis, Moerseil, at age 43.
1381: Had a son with Remsindis, Coekeа, at age 44.
1383: Had a daughter with Remsindis, Emmelina, at age 46.
Lost son Coekeа when Coekeа was 3 years old.
Lost daughter Emmelina when Emmelina was 1 years old.
